name: Volcanic Shots
description: ATTACK triggered right after DASH shoots 3 times in a row, consuming only one AMMO

name: Kiss The Groom
description: Quest (x20): Hitting at least one enemy with SPECIAL grants +0.5 Crit Chance
Reward: Any enemy hit by SPECIAL has a 40% chance to grant Juliet 2 Dream Shard(s)

name: Guns and Roses*
description: Quest (x10): Hitting an enemy by exploding Romeo's Rose with PERFECT SHOT grants +1.0 DMG
Reward: Rose explosions triggered with a PERFECT SHOT gain +50% range and +20% damage

name: Wedding Gifts*
description: Whenever they gain a Magical Object, Romeo and Juliet have a +20%/+10%/+5% chance to gift the other the same common, rare, or epic Magical Object

name: Longshot
description: POWER gains +50% range and deals +20% damage to enemies hit beyond half the maximum range

name: Hot Shots
description: ATTACKS triggered within 2 seconds after a POWER applies IGNITE to hit enemies and deal +20% damage

name: Shadow Round
description: PERFECT SHOT applies VULNERABLE for 2 seconds to hit enemies

name: Defensive Reload
description: Reload 3 AMMO after DEFENSE

name: Bullet Ballet
description: Shots fired from DEFENSE can ricochet to nearby enemies, dealing 60% ATTACK damage

name: Valiant Hearts
description: TRAIT grants both Romeo and Juliet +20% MOVE SPEED and STRENGTH for 5 seconds

name: Large Chambers
description: Maximum amount of AMMO is increased by 2
ATTACK and POWER damage are increased by 3% for each missing AMMO

name: Overflowing Passion
description: SPECIAL restores 6 Health to all Heroes around whenever it hits at least one enemy

name: Double Tap
description: Hold POWER to trigger 2 shots in a row
The second shot deals 60% damage

name: Swirling Rose*
description: ATTACKS hitting Romeo's Roses make them spin, dealing 60% damage of Juliet's ATTACK damage all around

name: Love Sparks
description: SPECIAL fires 4 homing projectiles towards nearby enemies, each one dealing 18 damage

name: Knockout
description: When Juliet is very close to enemy, ATTACK turns into a strike using the butt of her pistol, dealing 400% damage at close range without consuming AMMO (4 seconds cooldown)

name: Comforting Presence*
description: Crossing through a Hero using DASH grants 20 SHIELD to all Heroes around for 6 seconds

name: Explosive Backstep
description: While holding POWER, using ATTACK makes Juliet step back and shoot at the ground, dealing 100% of POWER's damage in a zone

name: Blind Shots
description: DEFENSE fires 3 more shot(s) than the number of AMMO remaining

name: Heartbeat
description: Using TRAIT or receiving Romeo's TRAIT triggers a sonic wave dealing 100 damage all around Juliet

name: Shrapnel
description: Using POWER also triggers a shrapnel burst dealing 40% damage in a cone

name: Lucky Shot
description: ATTACKS have 6% chance to turn into a POWER shot

name: Passion Dance
description: Restore between 4 and 8 Health per second to all Heroes nearby during ULTIMATE's dance  (depending on the movement speed)
[SOLO] 6 Health per second

name: Flashy Ending
description: Dancing gauge can be filled up according to the synchronization of Romeo and Juliet's movements during ULTIMATE
Trigger an explosion at the end of Wild Waltz, dealing 270 to 540 area damage (based on dancing gauge level)
[SOLO] Deal 405 area damage
changePerLevel: Rare & Legendary: +67min to +67max area damage + Hero Level + DMG

name: Plague Flask
description: ULTIMATE's explosion applies MARKED to hit enemies for 4 second(s)

name: Unstable Concoction
description: Using DASH makes Juliet drop a flask of poison onto the ground, dealing 30 damage in a zone
Unstable Concoction does NOT create a lingering pool of poison
